description: Configure visit type behavior so each selection reveals the correct care team sections. Acceptance criteria: selecting Initial Visit shows nurse, doctor, and social worker sections; selecting Follow Up shows nurse and doctor sections only; selecting Home Visit shows nurse section only; sections not applicable to the selected visit type are hidden and do not appear on screen.
steps_to_verify: Set visit type to Initial Visit and confirm nurse, doctor, and social worker sections are visible.
Set visit type to Follow Up and confirm nurse and doctor sections are visible while social worker is hidden.
Set visit type to Home Visit and confirm only nurse section is visible while doctor and social worker are hidden.
Switch between all three visit types and confirm the visible sections update immediately and no stale sections remain.

description: Add Nurse section to appointment dialog
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment dialog and set visit type to Initial Visit, Follow Up, or Home Visit and confirm the Nurse section is present.
Nurse section includes fields for Nurse Name (autocomplete input), start time input (time picker) and end time input (time picker).
Verify that all fields within the Nurse section are functional and correctly labeled.
Ensure that the Nurse section adheres to the overall design and layout of the appointment dialog.

description: On doctor cell input, ensure that only doctors are shown in the autocomplete dropdown

Click on the doctor cell to trigger the autocomplete dropdown.

description: On any cell input, ensure that user can save using button or Enter key and cancel using cancel button or Escape key
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment page.
Click on any cell to edit and click save button and make sure cell content change.
Click on any cell to edit and click cancel button and make sure cell content revert or doesn't change.
Click on any cell to edit and press Enter key and make sure cell content change.
Click on any cell to edit and press Esc key and make sure cell content doesn't change.

description: On click in save when editing a cell, ensure that the cell exits edit mode
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment page.
Click on any cell to edit and change the content.
Click on the save button and ensure that the cell exits edit mode and displays the updated content.

description: On click in cancel when editing a cell, ensure that the cell exits edit mode
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment page.
Click on any cell to edit and change the content.
Click on the cancel button and ensure that the cell exits edit mode and displays the original content.

description: Add a 2 tabs from Primvue and style it with bootstrap to toggle between table view and calendar view on appointment page
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment page and verify that there are 2 tabs at the top of the page.
Click on the 'Table View' tab and ensure that the appointment table is displayed.
Click on the 'Calendar View' tab and ensure that the appointment calendar is displayed.
Switch between the tabs multiple times to ensure that the views toggle correctly without any issues.

description: In calendar view, ensure that appointments are displayed on the calendar component from Vuetify (Calendars)
steps_to_verify: Open the appointment page and switch to the calendar view tab.
Verify that all appointments are displayed on the calendar according to their scheduled dates and times.
Click on different dates to ensure that appointments for those dates are shown correctly.

description: We need to migrate using bootstrap into using CSS without framework to make ui modernization easier in the future.
steps_to_verify: After removing bootstrap, check all pages for any styling issues.
Verify that all components are displayed correctly and consistently across different browsers.
Ensure that responsive design is maintained and works well on various screen sizes.
Test all interactive elements to ensure they function as expected without any visual glitches.
